about_the_game:
Rich variety of weapons:
In the game, the arsenal is exceptionally rich, ranging from classic assault rifles and sniper rifles to future technology energy weapons, laser cannons, and even special devices that can change the battlefield pattern. There are more than 60 types of weapons for players to choose from, each with its unique attributes and tactical value.

Upgrade and strengthen:
As the battle progresses, Aiden can upgrade and evolve his weapons by collecting resources on the battlefield. From increasing basic damage and firing rate to unlocking special weapons, each upgrade makes Aiden more adept in battles.

Multiple types of enemies:
At the same time, there are dozens of enemies with different forms in the game, ranging from melee enemies to heavily armored units with powerful shields, and even shooters who can control ring weapons. They will constantly test Eden's intelligence and courage.

Card collection:
In order to survive in this endless battle, Eden also needs to collect mysterious cards scattered throughout the base. These cards not only unlock weapons and equipment, but also increase defense, improve movement speed, and grant special skills. Each card is a rare treasure.

Random map:
The game map adopts a random generation mechanism, and every challenge is a brand new experience. Players need to adapt flexibly in complex and ever-changing environments, utilize terrain advantages, and develop tactical strategies. In addition,

Multiple levels of difficulty:
It also provides various difficulty settings, from a simple mode suitable for beginners to a nightmare mode that challenges the limits, meeting the needs of different players and allowing everyone to find their own battle rhythm.

Background of the story:
In the distant year 3096, on a desolate planet in the Centaur system, humans established the magnificent interstellar base "Dawn City" as a bridgehead for exploring the depths of the universe. However, a sudden disaster shattered the tranquility here - an unprecedented radiation leak, like the hand of a demon, pushed the peaceful base to the brink of destruction.

Radiation is like an invisible plague, rapidly spreading to every corner and infecting countless lives. Under the erosion of radiation, originally intelligent humans have gradually transformed into terrifying enemies who have lost their rationality and only know how to attack.

The protagonist Eden, a seasoned mercenary warrior. Faced with the alienation of his former companions and the crisis of the survival of the base, Eden resolutely picked up his weapon and became the last line of defense to protect the base.

name: Kill Neon
short_description: In 3096, the most severe radiation leak ever occurred at a base in the Centaurus galaxy. Infected humans have been transformed into thoughtless attacking species. In order to defend the colony, a massacre of the same kind began. What mystery lies behind this crisis?
supported_languages: English, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
